import React from 'react'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import caciLogo from '../../images/PositioningForFuture.webp'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faChevronRIGHT } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import './Pages.css'; export default function AdditionalInformation() { const navigate = useNavigate(); return (

Additional Information

Some of our highlights from FY22 include:

  • Generating more than $6.2 billion in revenue, representing a 2.6% year-over-year increase.
  • Winning $7.1 billion in contract awards, with 40% representing new business.
  • Adjusted EBITDA margin of 10.3%.
  • Robust cash flow of more than $695 million.
  • Acquiring ID Technologies, expanding our enterprise modernization and secure communications technologies, and SA Photonics, broadening our free-space optical communications expertise and technology.

navigate('/financialHighlights')}> navigate('/expertiseTechnology')}>

); }
